name: Offeritright
description: OfferItRight is a trusted platform where Employers & Headhunters can send out 100% digital offers, and delight the candidate with a pleasant onboarding experience, thereby minimizing churn of your precious prospective employees.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: India's Most Trusted Onboarding Platform
ShortDescription: Trusted platform for digital offers and seamless onboarding, reducing candidate churn.
enhanced_description: OfferItRight is a trusted platform, headquartered in Hyderabad, India, launched in 2019, that empowers Employers & Headhunters to send out 100% digital job offers. It provides a delightful and seamless digital onboarding experience, which significantly helps in minimizing the churn of prospective employees and boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity. Positioned as 'India's Most Trusted Onboarding Platform', it facilitates smooth, hassle-free recruitment and easy communication with prospective candidates.
key_use_cases: Candidate onboarding automation and experience enhancement
Minimizing candidate churn during the offer and onboarding phase
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Focus on enhancing candidate onboarding experience
Proven ability to minimize candidate churn
Claimed market leadership and trust in India for onboarding
